page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE IN BURGHFIELD
page.content: Our family gets up at 7.30, except for Dad who gets up at 6.30 because he has to go to work. When we get up, we get dressed and go down to breakfast. Usually we have cornflakes. After breakfast John goes upstairs to play with his cars and we stay downstairs and draw. We leave for school at 8.45 and get there at 8.55, and I play football. When I get home at 3.45, I watch television and Keith, Paul and John play in the garden. Then at 5.15 we have tea. I set off for football practice at 5.40. While I'm there my brothers go to bed. When I get home I have something to eat and watch 'Street Hawk' on television. Then I go to bed.
